item.title: Apache Hop 2.1 is available!!
item.description: After four and a half months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.1.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.1 brings: MongoDB Apache Beam Execution Information Framework and Data Profiling Kubernetes Documentation New plugins Community JIRA or download Hop 2.
